title: The Sleeping Beauty Trilogy
description: In 1983, Anne Rice, writing as A.N. Roquelaure, began the first installment of the trilogy that is now considered a forerunner of erotic literature. This trilogy, containing the books "The Claiming of Sleeping Beauty, Beauty's Punishment, "and "Beauty's Release" is a testament to Anne Rice's irresistible talent. Now in a repackaged edition, Rice's charged eroticism and magical style is back, connecting old and new readers alike.
author: A.N. Roquelaure
